comment.author: 15230795@N03
comment._content: I'm using the images to help design my cathedral in a Minecraft (computer game) project! (ie. imgur.com/nplFz ) These old photos really are better than the normal tourist snaps you see around. A lot easier to see how the vaulting etc. were done.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: That's a very cool use of the images lhmemies! Thanks for letting us know. I like to think that Goodyear (the curator who took these pictures back in the early 20th century) would love it, too. His real interest was in the structure and design, not just the aesthetics. Deb Wythe Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab
